code: import{LOADING_DATA,POST_DATA,DELETE_DATA,STORE_DATA,FAILED}from'./ActionType';export var storeData=function storeData(){return function(dispatch){try{dispatch({type:LOADING_DATA});fetch('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts').then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(data){dispatch({type:STORE_DATA,payload:data});});}catch(e){dispatch({type:FAILED,payload:e.message});}};};export var postData=function postData(data){return function(dispatch){try{dispatch({type:LOADING_DATA});dispatch({type:POST_DATA,payload:data});}catch(e){dispatch({type:FAILED,payload:e.message});}};};export var deleteData=function deleteData(data){return function(dispatch){try{dispatch({type:LOADING_DATA});dispatch({type:DELETE_DATA,payload:data});}catch(e){console.log("e",e);dispatch({type:FAILED,payload:e.message});}};};
